title: N2O4 NO2 equil - P of NO2 if P of N2O4 is 1.33atm

content.description:
<math> <semantics> <mtable columnalign="left"> <mtr> <mtd> <msub> <mtext> N</mtext> <mn>2</mn> </msub> <msub> <mtext>O</mtext> <mn>4</mn> </msub> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>⇄</mo><mn>2</mn><msub> <mtext> NO</mtext> <mn>2</mn> </msub> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mtext> </mtext><mtext> </mtext><msub> <mi>K</mi> <mi>p</mi> </msub> <mo>=</mo><mn>3.0</mn><mtext> at 70</mtext><mo>°</mo><mtext>C</mtext> </mtd> </mtr> <mtr> <mtd> <mi>c</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>l</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>r</mi><mi>l</mi><mi>e</mi><mi>s</mi><mi>s</mi><mtext> </mtext><mtext> </mtext><mi>b</mi><mi>r</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>w</mi><mi>n</mi> </mtd> </mtr> </mtable> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahGart1ev3aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakqaabeqaaiaabccaca qGobWaaSbaaSqaaiaaikdaaeqaaOGaae4tamaaBaaaleaacaaI0aaa beaakiaacIcacaWGNbGaaiykaiablsCiakaaikdacaqGGaGaaeOtai aab+eadaWgaaWcbaGaaGOmaaqabaGccaGGOaGaam4zaiaacMcacaaM f8UaaGzbVlaadUeadaWgaaWcbaGaamiCaaqabaGccqGH9aqpcaaIZa GaaiOlaiaaicdacaqGGaGaaeyyaiaabshacaqGGaGaae4naiaabcda cqGHWcaScaqGdbaabaGaam4yaiaad+gacaWGSbGaam4Baiaadkhaca WGSbGaamyzaiaadohacaWGZbGaaGzbVlaaywW7caWGIbGaamOCaiaa d+gacaWG3bGaamOBaaaaaa@678B@ </annotation> </semantics> </math>

A mixture of NO2(g) and N2O4(g) is placed in a glass tube and allowed to reach equilibrium at 70°C, as represented above.
content.question: If <math> <semantics> <mrow> <msub> <mi>P</mi> <mrow> <msub> <mi>N</mi> <mn>2</mn> </msub> <msub> <mi>O</mi> <mn>4</mn> </msub> </mrow> </msub> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3A86@</annotation> </semantics> </math> is 1.33 atm when the system is at equilibrium at 70°C, what is <math> <semantics> <mrow> <msub> <mi>P</mi> <mrow> <mi>N</mi> <msub> <mi>O</mi> <mn>2</mn> </msub> </mrow> </msub> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3990@</annotation> </semantics> </math>?
